title: BRIEF-Kleos Space SecureS Two Additional South American Pre-Orders
text:
BRIEF-Kleos Space SecureS Two Additional South American Pre-Orders

Stock Markets 59 minutes ago (Oct 04, 2019 09:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Kleos Space SecureS Two Additional South American Pre-Orders Oct 4 (Reuters) - Kleos Space SA : * SECURED TWO ADDITIONAL SOUTH AMERICAN PRE-ORDERS * TOTAL SOUTH AMERICAN POTENTIAL REVENUES REACH AUD$1.5 MILLION PER ANNUM FOR FIRST CLUSTER RISING TO AUD$2.1 MILLION INCORPORATING SECOND CLUSTER * KLEOS SECURED PRE-ORDERS WITH CHILEAN, GEOCIENCIAS E.I.R.L AND BRAZILIAN HEX GEOSPATIAL TECHNOLOGIES

BRIEF-Kleos Space SecureS Two Additional South American Pre-Orders
description: BRIEF-Kleos Space SecureS Two Additional South American Pre-Orders
